extensionName.message: Purge Alert - Monitor Your Voter Registration

extensionDescription.message: Monitor your voter registration and get alerted if your registration is every purged from the voter rolls.

browserActionTitle.message: Purge Alert - Monitor Your Voter Registration
browserActionTitle.description: Title for the browser action icon

popupBlankStateLink.description: What the add registration button should say when there's no entries

popupAddAdditionalLink.description: What the add registration button should say when there's already entries

popupFooterLink.description: Project title for the footer link

popupFooterMessage.message: is an open-source project by OpenAustin.
popupFooterMessage.description: Description of who makes this project

addRegStateDropdown.description: Placeholder for a state selection dropdown

addRegSubmit.description: Button text for submitting a new voter registration

addRegCancel.description: Button text for deciding not to add a registration (closes the window)

addRegSubmitting.description: Button text pending state for submitting a new voter registration

addRegFooterLink.description: Project title for the footer link

addRegFooterMessage.message: is an open-source project by OpenAustin.
addRegFooterMessage.description: Description of who makes this project

addRegFirstNamePlaceholder.description: Voter lookup first name text input placeholder

addRegLastNamePlaceholder.description: Voter lookup last name text input placeholder

addRegDateOfBirthLabel.description: Voter lookup date of birth field

addRegCountyLabel.description: Voter lookup date of birth field

addRegCountyPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for a county selection dropdown

addRegZipCodeLabel.description: Voter lookup date of birth field

addRegZipCodePlaceholder.description: Voter lookup zip code text input placeholder

addRegPermissionSubmitMessage.description: Button text for showing the permission prompt

addRegSuccess.description: Message for when adding a new voter registration was successful

addRegCloseWindow.description: Link telling the user they can close the add-registration window when done

askPermissionButton.description: Button text for showing the permission prompt

stateTexasPermissionAsk.message: We need your permission to access the Texas Secretary of State's website (sos.texas.gov)
stateTexasPermissionAsk.description: Ask the user to grant permission to make a cross-origin request

voterNotFoundError.description: Error message for when found no voters that matches the lookup

blockedByCloudflare.message: Lookup blocked by Cloudflare (this is usually because you are using a VPN)
blockedByCloudflare.description: Error message for when lookup website is using Cloudflare and they block the request

voterLookupError.description: Error message for when an unhandled error happened during lookup

needPermissionError.description: Error message for when lookup doesn't have correct permissions to lookup the voter registration

seeLogsLink.description: Link to see the logs for a voter registration entry

editLink.description: Link to edit a voter registration entry

removeLink.description: Suffix for relative times in the future

checkAgainLink.description: Link to trigger checking a voter registration status again

checkAgainSubmit.description: The status message that displays when a user asks to check the voter registration again

regStatusValid.description: Status message when a voter registeration is good

lastUpdated.description: Prefix for when an entry was last updated

lastUpdateValid.description: Prefix for when an entry was last updated

lastUpdateEmpty.description: Error message for when couldn't find the entry's voter on the voter rolls

lastUpdateEmptyLink.description: Link to edit a voter registration entry

lastUpdateNeedsAttention.description: Error message for when the user needs to resolve some issue with their entry

lastUpdateNeedsAttentionLink.description: Error message for when the user needs to resolve some issue with their entry

timeSincePast.description: Suffix for relative times in the past

timeSinceFuture.description: Suffix for relative times in the future

editEntryFirstNamePlaceholder.description: Voter lookup first name text input placeholder

editEntryLastNamePlaceholder.description: Voter lookup last name text input placeholder

editEntryDateOfBirthLabel.description: Voter lookup date of birth field

editEntryDateOfBirthPlaceholder.description: Voter lookup date of birth text input placeholder

editEntryCountyLabel.description: Voter lookup date of birth field

editEntryZipCodeLabel.description: Voter lookup date of birth field

editEntryZipCodePlaceholder.description: Voter lookup zip code text input placeholder

editEntryUpdateButton.description: Submit button to re-check and update an existing entry

editEntryUpdating.description: Button text pending state for updating an existing entry

editEntryCancelButton.description: Don't edit and entry and close the window

editEntrySuccess.description: Button text pending state for updating an existing entry

editEntryCloseWindow.description: Button text pending state for updating an existing entry

removeConfirmQuestion.message: Are you sure you want to remove this registration?
removeConfirmQuestion.description: Confirmation text for removing an entry

removeConfirmSubmit.description: Button to remove an entry in the remove confirmation dialogue

removeConfirmWaiting.description: Pending button text when user submits the removal confirmation button

removeConfirmCancel.description: Button to cancel and close the confirmation dialogue
